org.dsa.iot.dslink.handshake

Class LocalKeys

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.handshake.LocalKeys

  • public class LocalKeys
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a local key ring.

      • encodedHashPublicKey

        public java.lang.String encodedHashPublicKey()
        The key is first sent through a SHA256 hash which is then encoded into base64.
        Returns:
        Hashed key

      • encodedPublicKey

        public java.lang.String encodedPublicKey()
        Encodes the Q of the public key. The encoding is uncompressed.
        Returns:
        base64 encoded public key Q

      • serialize

        public java.lang.String serialize()
        Serializes the public and private keys in a standard form. The format is base64 encoded D and base64 encoded Q separated by a space.
        Returns:
        Standard serialized key pair

      • getFromFileSystem

        public static LocalKeys getFromFileSystem(java.io.File file)
        Retrieves and deserializes local keys from the file system. If the file doesn't exist then keys will be generated and stored at the designated path.
        Parameters:
        file - Path of the keys
        Returns:
        Keys

      • generate
